compatibility.notes: The UCAR license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Must include the copyright notice and disclaimer in all redistributions.
Must not use the names of contributors for promotion without permission.
License terminates if a patent infringement claim is made against the copyright holders or contributors.
license.name: UCAR
obligations: Retain copyright notice in redistributions of source code.
Include copyright notice and disclaimer in redistributions in binary form.
Obtain specific prior written permission for using names of the development group, copyright holders, or contributors for endorsement or promotion.
